name: Crash - Willow King
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2015! #GGJ15

Take control of a stickman that quickly becomes the strongest character of the game. The boss, too scared to fight the player finds a way out but destroys the whole game including the player's avatar. Now the boss is on the loose and he is going to destroy your whole computer! What do you do now?

Credits:

Anaïs Bordreuil : Lead Artist

Quentin Sutter: Lead Animation, programation

Esther Berges: Lead Developper

Clément Ballanger : Lead Game design, animation

Benoît Cohin : Lead Sound

#WillowKing
